reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: You get 4 of these for $12.99. That's a great deal!!! They are very detailed and very solid. Soooooo pretty! I got the silver. The pearl on the body is a light bronze color.One thing that I HAVE to say... Don't pay attention to the reviews that say the fragrance tabs fall out. They are not installing them properly!!! When you are actually attaching the clip part to the bee you have to slide it on so the fragrance tab slot faces up when the bee is positioned on the vent!!! The clip part installs in several ways so you have to pay attention to that!!! The bee will be facing up and to the right when installed. There is no other direction for it to be able to face!!! So all 4 bees will have to face the same way.The fragrance is non-existent. It's very vague when the blowing air is on Hot. I have some other vent clips where the tabs came without fragrance. They are a soft felt that you add your own fragrance to. I am going to try what someone else did. They rinsed the tab in water and let it dry and added their own essential oil. I did notice that on this listing page they had another listing picture at the bottom where there are 10 tabs for sale in several fragrance choices. I think they would be the same as these included ones. No fragrance... So I really don't have a definite answer...I really purchased these for the blingy car accessories I think they are! I have these clipped along with a large flower ($11 each) per vent!!! Yes... My dash looks like it has everything but the kitchen sink on it... VERY BLINGY!!! But I LOOOOOVE it!!! My justification is that I am a Master Gardener and I NEED the bees pollinating the flowers. Secretly, I feel the blingier the better!!! It makes me HAPPY!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality is very important
reviews.reviewText: Item well constructed colors are nice, a nice size and look adorable. She is mild but present. I would recommend this item. It was a gift to my daughter she loves bees.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Super cute but ...
reviews.reviewText: These bee clips are super cute. They add a nice bling look to my vehicle but they are crap as air fresheners. The little scented disc's have no scent and will fall out of the bee holder if you adjust your air vent. I purchased solely for appearance which is good since their air freshener functionality is nonexistent. Also one bee arrived with the pearl having fallen off but my husband glued it back on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful in my car
reviews.reviewText: This product is fun to use easy to use beautiful I catching versatile. I can put a cotton ball in it with a little essential oils and have any scent I want. Everyone who rides in my car loves my little bees I recommend them and would give them his gifts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Bees are cute and great idea
reviews.reviewText: I love the bees but the scents don’t smell like anything at all. Really disappointed. They are a great idea. I’m going to try my own essential oils on a cotton pad.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install and cute
reviews.reviewText: This cute little bee was very easy to clip right on the vent. I stuffed a cotton ball in the empty space in the back of the bee then put a few drops of my favorite essential oil on the cotton ball. Scent lastest more than 1 week then I added more drops of oil. Eventually, I will change the cotton ball and start over. It's a great way to get the scent you prefer and it's a cheaper way to make your car smell nice. It did come with a small tablet to put in that space but I did not favor the scent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This beauty was a wonderful addition to my now most gorgeous dream car!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These little bees are way bigger, and way more pretty than I ever expected. I absolutely love them. The sun doesn’t last very long and it’s very strong but I just like the look of them in my vent
